about_the_game:
God vs. Sin

Play as a devout priest in a medieval world and take responsibility for your church. The nuns were corrupted by the devilish succubus Lilona and are now trying to desecrate your church through sinful lewdness. Are you able to sustain your faith?

Sacred career

As you proof yourself as a true man of god, others will recognize your achievements which will enable you to take over bigger churches and get access to new units. But prepare for new levels of horniness as you climb the holy ranks.

Tower defense

Defend against different types of corrupted women such as nuns, countrywomen and cooking MILFs. Place units on a grid which automatically attack incoming enemies that enter the grid on the right side. Use simple priests to generate faith that you have to collect by clicking on it. With faith points you can hire new units on your path to purity.

Key features

  • Experience a hot story in a medieval world.
  • Fight strategic tower-defense battles against horny women and strive to stay pure.
  • Unlock steamy reward scenes with animations.

Show your interest

If you want to support this game, show your interest by wishlisting it or join our Discord and share your ideas and thoughts!
